content: 20 22 st repeats 6 times on each round and is worked from rounds 1 45 1-51 while setting up the pattern in the first row place a stitch marker after every 20 22 st repeat for further orientation in round 31 35 start to work the decreases by purling 2 st together as highlighted in the chart in every other round stitches are decreased while finishing round 45 51 with 24 24 st remaining on the needle this pattern recommends to switch from a circular needle to dpns after round 37 43 or as needed legend = k1 knit one size l - = p1 purl one = = purl 2 st together 22212019181716151413121110 9 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 51 = = 51 = no stitch 50 - - - - 50 49 = - - = 49 48 - - - - - - 48 size m 47 = - - = 47 2019181716151413121110 9 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 46 - - - - 46 45 = = 45 45 = - - - - = 45 44 - - - - 44 44 - - - - - - 44 43 = - - = 43 43 = - - - - = 43 42 - - - - - - 42 42 - - - - - - - - 42 41 = - - = 41 41 = - - - - = 41 40 - - - - 40 40 - - - - - - 40 39 = - - - - = 39 39 = - - - - - - = 39 38 - - - - - - 38 38 - - - - - - - - 38 37 = - - - - = 37 37 = - - - - - - = 37 36 - - - - - - - - 36 36 - - - - - - - - - - 36 35 = - - - - = 35 35 = - - - - - - = 35 34 - - - - - - 34 34 - - - - - - - - 34 33 = - - - - - - = 33 33 - - - - - - - - - - 33 32 - - - - - - - - 32 32 - - - - - - - - - - 32 31 = - - - - - - = 31 31 - - - - - - - - 31 30 - - - - - - - - - - 30 30 - - - - - - - - - - 30 29 - - - - - - - - 29 29 - - - - - - - - - - 29 28 - - - - - - - - 28 28 - - - - - -
